## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNGroup] objects that match the predicate.

## Discussion

This method returns an empty array when no matching groups are found. If an error occurs, this method returns `nil`. You should use only the predicates defined in [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNGroup] class predicates. Compound predicates are not supported. Contacts may be members of one or more groups, depending upon the account they come from.

# groups(matching:)

**Instance Method**

Fetches all groups matching the specified predicate.

## Declaration

```swift
func groups(matching predicate: NSPredicate?) throws -> [CNGroup]
```

## Parameters

- **predicate**: The predicate to use to fetch the matching groups. Set predicate to `nil` to match all groups.

## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNGroup] objects that match the predicate.

## Discussion

This method returns an empty array when no matching groups are found. If an error occurs, this method returns `nil`. You should use only the predicates defined in [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNGroup] class predicates. Compound predicates are not supported. Contacts may be members of one or more groups, depending upon the account they come from.



## Fetching groups and containers

- **defaultContainerIdentifier()**: Returns the identifier of the default container.
- **containers(matching:)**: Fetches all containers matching the specified predicate.
